recipe.name: Chicken Soup
recipe.preparation: Put into stockpot:  water, chicken broth, tomatoes, onions, garlic, celery, green pepper, parsley, salt & pepper.  Let come to a boil then turn fire to low & cook slowly (covered) for 1/2 hr.Add carrots, let simmer 10 minutes longer.  Add chicken breasts (whole) & cook 15 minutes longer or until done.  Add macaroni & butter.  Cook until macaroni is done (do not overcook).  Stir now and then to keep from sticking.Before serving, cut chicken up into bite-size pieces.Have butcher split, skin & bone chicken for you.Freezes well.Nell's note: S&W puts out a can of tomatoes that are peeled & cut up, but I cut them a little more.   For a 16-oz can, I just use half of the can.
